title: Add more colorful backgrounds, stylized text accents, and document profile photo file path

requirements.text: Make the portfolio’s overall background more colorful while keeping it professional and readable (e.g., add subtle multi-color gradients/aurora effects behind the page and/or alternating sections) and ensure the new background styling is applied consistently across the single-page layout.

quotes: add colourful background and decorated text

acceptanceCriteria: The site background shows a clearly more colorful (but not distracting) gradient/aurora-style treatment compared to the current flat dark navy background.
Text contrast remains accessible (no major readability regressions on headings, body text, and cards).
The updated background styling is consistent across the single-page portfolio (Hero through Footer), with sections still visually separated (e.g., via subtle overlays, tints, or dividers).
No changes are made to any files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

requirements.text: Enhance “decorated text” styling across the portfolio by adding tasteful typographic accents (e.g., gradient headings, highlighted keywords/labels, subtle text outlines/shadows where appropriate) while keeping the design cohesive with the existing palette and ensuring it works with reduced-motion/accessibility preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Section headings and key labels have visibly enhanced styling (e.g., gradients/accents) beyond the current baseline, without looking cluttered.
Decorative text effects do not reduce legibility on mobile and desktop breakpoints.
Reduced motion users do not see animated/flashy text effects (static styling remains acceptable).

requirements.text: Provide the exact in-repo file path where the user should place/replace their profile photo so it appears in the Hero section, and make this path discoverable in the codebase (e.g., via a clearly named constant and/or an inline comment near the Hero image). The currently used profile image path must be surfaced exactly as used by the app.

quotes: also give me path of file where i insert my photo

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section profile image source path is clearly documented in the codebase and matches the live-used path.

The documented path points to the currently referenced image: "/assets/generated/random-profile-photo.dim_800x800.jpg" and corresponds to a file location under "frontend/public/assets/generated/random-profile-photo.dim_800x800.jpg".
Documentation is written in English and is easy to find (e.g., comment adjacent to the in "frontend/src/pages/PortfolioSinglePage.tsx" or a small exported constant used by the component).

constraints: Frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be modified (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not introduce any new backend services or external dependencies outside the existing stack.
nonGoals: Adding new portfolio sections or changing the existing content structure.
Implementing new authentication, admin panels, or image upload to the backend.
